struct.name: AntTrajectory
struct.brief: Defines a trajectory for an Ant

field.name: Ant
field.brief: Reports the fort::myrmidon::AntID of the Ant this trajectory refers to.

field.name: Space
field.brief: Reports the Space this trajectory is taking place.

field.name: Start
field.brief: Reports the starting fort::myrmidon::Time of this trajectory.
field.doc: Reports the starting fort::myrmidon::Time of this trajectory. fort::myrmidon::AntTrajectory::Positions first column are second offset from this time.

field.name: Positions
field.brief: Reports the time and position in the frame.
field.doc:
Reports the time and position in the frame.
* first column: offset in second since fort::myrmidon::AntTrajectory::Start * second and third column: X,Y position in the image * fourth column: Angle in ]-π,π], in trigonometric orientation. As in images Y axis points bottom, positove angle appears clockwise.

field.name: Zones
field.brief: Reports zone of ant if asked.
field.doc: Optional vector of either size 0 or Data.rows(). O value means currentlty not in a zone.
